name: supermarket-inventory
description: UAE Supermarket Inventory & Accounting - MERN Stack

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.fresh-start: cd backend && npm run clear-data && npm run seed
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:backend && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "cd frontend && npm run electron:dev"
